about_the_game:
In the distant future, a hyper-advanced CPU has been developed by the government. The CyberQuark Corporation has stolen this powerful technology to create a fleet of destructive AI robots. As a secret agent, your mission is to retrieve the stolen CPU and prevent CyberQuark from unleashing their deadly creations.

In Parkour Chief: Chapter Secret Agent, you'll need to combine parkour and stealth skills to infiltrate CyberQuark's headquarters. Navigate and fight your way through a series of obstacles and challenges to recover the CPU. Do you have what it takes to stop them?

The game, developed entirely by Mustafa Soltanian Fard Jahromi, complements his Parkour Chief YouTube series.

In Parkour Chief: Chapter Secret Agent, you'll need to combine parkour and stealth skills to infiltrate CyberQuark's headquarters. Navigate and fight your way through a series of obstacles and challenges to recover the CPU. Do you have what it takes to stop them?

The game, developed entirely by Mustafa Soltanian Fard Jahromi, complements his Parkour Chief YouTube series.

name: Parkour Chief: Chapter Secret Agent

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core processor @2.7 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: On-board sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In the future, you must retrieve a stolen hyper-advanced CPU from the CyberQuark Corporation before they use it to create destructive AI robots. In Parkour Chief: Secret Agent, you'll use your parkour and stealth skills to infiltrate CyberQuark's headquarters and recover the CPU.
